title: OnePlus’ V-Series Update Arrives: Here are the Devices that it’ll Support
description: It will be available for several devices with different OxygenOS versions. The post OnePlus’ V-Series Update Arrives: Here are the Devices that it’ll Support appeared first on Phandroid.
author: Mike Viray
excerpt: It will be available for several devices with different OxygenOS versions.
text: OnePlus recently announced that it was initiating the rollout of its new “V-Series” updates for OxygenOS, which fall under its regular system software updates. It will be available for several devices with different OxygenOS versions, and brings enhancements for stability, as well as improvements for screenshots and weather data. The update comes with software version number V10P02, although smartphones will get firmware version BRB1EX01, while tablets get version BRB3EX01. Part of OnePlus’ official announcement reads: We are pleased to announce the release of the version of V10P02, which is a part of OnePlus regular system upgrades. This update will bring you OnePlus self-developed apps and new features, allowing you to experience them immediately without waiting for the gradual OTA rollout. This update is currently being rolled out in batches. We encourage you to check for and install the latest update on your device… With all that said, the update is expected to arrive for the following devices: OxygenOS 14 OnePlus 12 Series OnePlus Open OnePlus 11 Series OnePlus 10 Series OnePlus 9 Series OnePlus 8T OnePlus Nord 4 5G / OnePlus Nord 3 5G / OnePlus Nord 2T 5G OnePlus Nord CE4 5G / OnePlus Nord CE3 5G / OnePlus Nord CE 3 Lite 5G / OnePlus Nord CE 2 Lite 5G OnePlus Pad / OnePlus Pad Go OxygenOS 13.1.0 OnePlus 8 / OnePlus 8 Pro OxygenOS 13.0.0 OnePlus Nord 2 5G OnePlus Nord CE 2 5G OnePlus Nord CE 5G Source: GSMArena A writer and content creator with a love for tech and music, Mike is also an avid gamer as well. html:
OnePlus recently announced that it was initiating the rollout of its new “V-Series” updates for OxygenOS, which fall under its regular system software updates. It will be available for several devices with different OxygenOS versions, and brings enhancements for stability, as well as improvements for screenshots and weather data.

The update comes with software version number V10P02, although smartphones will get firmware version BRB1EX01, while tablets get version BRB3EX01. Part of OnePlus’ official announcement reads:

We are pleased to announce the release of the version of V10P02, which is a part of OnePlus regular system upgrades. This update will bring you OnePlus self-developed apps and new features, allowing you to experience them immediately without waiting for the gradual OTA rollout. This update is currently being rolled out in batches. We encourage you to check for and install the latest update on your device…

With all that said, the update is expected to arrive for the following devices:

OxygenOS 14

  • OnePlus 12 Series
  • OnePlus Open
  • OnePlus 11 Series
  • OnePlus 10 Series
  • OnePlus 9 Series
  • OnePlus 8T
  • OnePlus Nord 4 5G / OnePlus Nord 3 5G / OnePlus Nord 2T 5G
  • OnePlus Nord CE4 5G / OnePlus Nord CE3 5G / OnePlus Nord CE 3 Lite 5G / OnePlus Nord CE 2 Lite 5G
  • OnePlus Pad / OnePlus Pad Go

OxygenOS 13.1.0

  • OnePlus 8 / OnePlus 8 Pro

OxygenOS 13.0.0

  • OnePlus Nord 2 5G
  • OnePlus Nord CE 2 5G
  • OnePlus Nord CE 5G

Source: GSMArena

A writer and content creator with a love for tech and music, Mike is also an avid gamer as well. He and his wife are big fans of Mario Kart.
